tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE error_alert_messages (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_errors (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	error_message VARCHAR(255),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_alerts (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	alert_message VARCHAR(255),
	severity INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_logs (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	log_message TEXT,
	source_ip VARCHAR(50),
	destination_ip VARCHAR(50),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vpn_service_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    level VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE error_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  error_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE alert_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_connections (
  connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  connection_status VARCHAR(20),
  connection_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vpn_servers (
  server_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  server_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50)
)
